successes.title: Radian: a motion time-lapse device for everyone.
successes.description: Ultra-simple and ultra-affordable. Feature rich. Pans AND tilts. The best way to create beautiful time lapses with your camera. Period. Â  Radian2 is now on Kickstarter->

Pledges.description: We'll be extremely grateful for your donation and put you on the very special list of contributors!

Your choice of a sleek Radian t-shirt or a 12x18 print (of your choosing) of Kris Cheng's photography! You also receive a Radian sticker and get added to the list of supporters. Free shipping to the US! (add $10 for international)

A simply unbelievable price. You get the Radian package - a camera cable of your choosing, a usb cable charger, and of course, a Radian. Everything you need to start time-lapsing! You also get a Radian t-shirt! Free shipping to the US!  (add $15 for international).

You get one Radian, a camera cable of your choosing, and a usb cable charger - everything you need to start creating awesome time lapses! T-shirt included. Free shipping to the US! (add $15 for international).
Special Charoal Black Radian! Includes everything you need to get started (Radian, camera cable, usb cable charger, and a sleek t-shirt). Free shipping to the US! (add $15 for international).

Vertical Radian package! Included is a Radian, camera cable, usb charging cable, t-shirt, as well as an L-bracket camera mount for vertical tilt time lapses. Free shipping to the US! (add $15 for international).

Special Edition Vertical Radian package! Included is a charcoal black Radian, camera cable, usb charging cable, t-shirt, as well as an L-bracket camera mount for vertical tilt time lapses. Free shipping to the US! (add $15 for international).
Buddypack! Get 2 Radians for $125 each! Included are all the cables and 2 t-shirts. Free shipping to the US!  (add $15 for international).
Yet another buddypack! Get 2 Radians and save $10! Included are all the cables and 2 t-shirts. Free shipping to the US! (add $15 for international).

Pan/tilt combo package! Now you can simultaneously pan AND tilt - included are 2 Radians, 2 modified L-brackets, all the appropriate cables, and a t-shirt! Free shipping to the US! (add $15 for international).
Quad-pack: get 4 Radian packages! Included are all the cables for every Radian, and 4 t-shirts. Free shipping to the US! (add $30 for international).

A Radian package + the trip of a lifetime! Join Kris and the pro photographers behind Yosemite HD - Colin Delehanty and Sheldon Neill - on a 3 day adventure photographing all over Yosemite. We'll teach you everything we know about time-lapsing and photography, and help you to start taking awesome shots of your own! All trip expenses upon arrival will be covered (including food and equipment rentals). We'll even work with you to tailor the date and all of the details to fit your needs!
